description: This is a Java source file defining a REST controller named TodoController, which exposes CRUD endpoints for managing Todo items in a web application. It handles creating, listing, retrieving, updating, toggling completion, and deleting todos, with detailed API documentation annotations.

classes.name: TodoController
classes.description: REST controller providing CRUD operations for Todo items with API documentation annotations.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new Todo item by accepting a validated request body and returning the created Todo response.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Retrieves a list of Todo items, optionally filtered by completion status or search query.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a specific Todo item by its unique identifier.

methods.name: putUpdate
methods.description: Replaces an existing Todo item entirely, requiring a full set of data.

methods.name: patchUpdate
methods.description: Partially updates an existing Todo item with provided fields.

methods.name: toggleComplete
methods.description: Toggles the completion status of a specific Todo item.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a specific Todo item by its identifier.
